openFile

public static java.io.File openFile(java.io.File aParentDirectory,
                                    java.lang.String aFileName)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Loads a File instance for the passed filename, aFileName, in the passed parent directory, aParentDirectory.

Parameters:
aParentDirectory - The directory containing aFileName
aFileName - The name of the file to load
Returns:
A File instance for the passed filename, aFileName, in the passed parent directory, aParentDirectory.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - The passed filename, aFileName, does not exist in the passed parent directory, aParentDirectory .
java.io.FileNotFoundException
